Text: Thank you so much for uploading Revista!

I love whoever uploaded this.
Haven't been able to see revista since like the 4th of January.
Any chance you have earlier versions or you will be uploading this in the future too?
So many thanks for this,really hope you can upload future shows.Muchos gracias amigo :)))
does the audio stop working after 11 mins for anyone else?
Whoever uploaded this deserves a medal of some sort. Thanks a million! Like someone else said, I haven't been able to get Revista since early Jan. You rock!
